Toggle: Jinx switches between  Pow-Pow, her minigun, and  Fishbones, her rocket launcher.

Fishbones

1.text: Pow-Pow: Basic attacks with Pow-Pow generate a stack of  Rev'd up for 2.5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent attacks with Pow-Pow and stacking up to 3 times. Each stack of Rev'd up grants  bonus attack speed, with all stacks beyond the first one being 50% effective. Stacks expire by one when the duration ends.
1.html: Pow-Pow: Basic attacks with Pow-Pow generate a stack of Rev'd up for 2.5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent attacks with Pow-Pow and stacking up to 3 times. Each stack of Rev'd up grants  bonus attack speed, with all stacks beyond the first one being 50% effective. Stacks expire by one when the duration ends.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed

2.text: Fishbones: Basic attacks with Fishbones cost  mana on-attack to deal 110% AD modified physical damage to the target and nearby enemies. The damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers. While Fishbones is equipped, Jinx gains  bonus range but loses  10% of her bonus attack speed.
2.html: Fishbones: Basic attacks with Fishbones cost  mana on-attack to deal 110% AD modified physical damage to the target and nearby enemies. The damage is affected by critical strike modifiers. While Fishbones is equipped, Jinx gains  bonus range but loses  10% of her bonus attack speed.

0.text: Active: Jinx tosses out 3 Chompers centered at the target location, landing after 0.4 seconds, arming after 0.5 seconds, and exploding after 5 seconds to deal magic damage to nearby enemies.
0.html: Active: Jinx tosses out 3 Chompers centered at the target location, landing after 0.4 seconds, arming after 0.5 seconds, and exploding after 5 seconds to deal magic damage to nearby enemies.

1.text: Each Chomper explodes on contact with an enemy  champion,  knocking them down and  rooting them for 1.5 seconds. Enemy champions can be affected by only one Chomper.
1.html: Each Chomper explodes on contact with an enemy champion, knocking them down and rooting them for 1.5 seconds. Enemy champions can be affected by only one Chomper.

knocking them down
rooting

2.html: Flame Chompers! will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.html: Active: Jinx fires a massive rocket in the target direction, briefly granting sight of its surroundings and exploding upon colliding with an enemy champion. The explosion deals physical damage to nearby enemies and grants sight of the area for 2 seconds.

1.html: Super Mega Death Rocket! deals 10% − 100% (based on distance traveled) damage. This does not affect the bonus damage based on the target's missing health.
